heading: # Time pickers
headingText: The `v-time-picker` is stand-alone component that can be utilized in many existing Vuetify components. It offers the user a visual representation for selecting the time.

usage.desc: Time pickers have the light theme enabled by default.

colorable.heading: ### Colors
colorable.desc: Time picker colors can be set using the `color` and `header-color` props. If `header-color` prop is not provided  header will use the `color` prop value.

dialog-and-menu.heading: ### In dialog and menu
dialog-and-menu.desc: Due to the flexibility of pickers, you can really dial in the experience exactly how you want it.

24h-format.heading: ### 24h format
24h-format.desc: A time picker can be switched to 24hr format. Note that the `format` prop defines only the way the picker is displayed, picker's value (model) is always in 24hr format.

allowed-times.heading: ### Allowed times
allowed-times.desc: You can specify allowed times using arrays, objects, and functions. You can also specify time step/precision/interval - e.g. 10 minutes.

width.heading: ### Setting picker width
width.desc: You can specify allowed the picker's width or make it full width.

ampm-in-title.heading: ### AM/PM switch in title
ampm-in-title.desc: You can move AM/PM switch to picker's title.

disabled.heading: ### Disabled
disabled.desc: You can't interact with disabled picker.

readonly.heading: ### Read-only
readonly.desc: Read-only picker behaves same as disabled one, but looks like default one.

use-seconds.heading: ### With seconds
use-seconds.desc: Time picker can have seconds input.

scrollable.heading: ### Scrollable
scrollable.desc: You can edit time picker's value using mouse wheel.

range.heading: ### Range
range.desc: This is an example of joining pickers together using `min` and `max` prop.

v-time-picker.format: Defines the format of a time displayed in picker. Available options are `ampm` and `24hr`.
v-time-picker.allowedHours: Restricts which hours can be selected
v-time-picker.allowedMinutes: Restricts which minutes can be selected
v-time-picker.allowedSeconds: Restricts which seconds can be selected
v-time-picker.scrollable: Allows changing hour/minute with mouse scroll
v-time-picker.useSeconds: Toggles the use of seconds in picker
v-time-picker.ampmInTitle: Place AM/PM switch in title, not near the clock.

events.click:hour: Emitted when user selects the hour
events.click:minute: Emitted when user selects the minute
events.click:second: Emitted when user selects the second
events.change: Emitted when the time selection is done (when user changes the minute for HH:MM picker and the second for HH:MM:SS picker
events.update:period: Emitted when user clicks the AM/PM button

slots.default: Displayed below the clock, can be used for example for adding action button (`OK` and `Cancel`)
